channel.title: Example on HomotopyContinuation.jl
channel.description: Recent content in Example on HomotopyContinuation.jl

item.title: Welcome!
item.description: Welcome to our new homepage! Hi there! We are excited to launch the new homepage for HomotopyContinuation.jl. We plan to keep you here updated with the latest development news, interesting applications and general thoughts. If you use HomotopyContinuation.jl and want to share your experience get in touch with us!
